item.title: 交易日：特朗普跨越美联储卢比孔河，市场不以为意
item.description: 周一，投资者对特朗普政府威胁要对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔提起刑事指控的重大新闻置之不理，推动标普500指数创下历史新高，贵金属价格也飙升至新高峰。【原文：Investors on Monday brushed aside the dramatic news of the Trump administration's threat to criminally indict Fed Chair Jerome Powell, lifting the S&P 500 to an all-time high, while precious metals also soared to new peaks.】

item.title: 美国撤销明确禁止对移民贷款歧视的政策
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局和司法部周一撤销了明确禁止贷款机构歧视移民和非公民的指导方针，此举可能削弱移民获取贷款的法律保障。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and ​the Department of Justice withdrew guidance expressly prohibiting lenders from discriminating against immigrants and ‌non-citizens on Monday, potentially denting immigrants' legal ability to access loans.】

item.title: 巴西反垄断机构对WhatsApp商业工具展开调查
item.description: 巴西反垄断机构CADE周一表示，已就Meta旗下WhatsApp Business工具的新条款展开调查，并将在评估期间暂停该工具在巴西的新条款实施。【原文：Brazilian antitrust body CADE said on Monday it had opened an investigation into the new terms of Meta's WhatsApp Business tool, adding it would also suspend the tool's new terms in Brazil while it evaluates the case.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，Meta计划裁减Reality Labs部门约10%的员工。
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周一报道，知情人士透露，Meta计划裁减其Reality Labs部门约10%的员工，该部门负责包括元宇宙在内的产品开发。【原文：Meta plans to cut around 10% of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, the New York Times reported on Monday, citing three people with knowledge of the discussions.】

item.title: 银行警告称，特朗普对信用卡利率设定的10%上限将损害消费者利益
item.description: 美国银行和金融机构周一反对特朗普总统提出的信用卡利率上限提案，援引新数据显示该政策将导致数百万美国家庭和小企业丧失信贷渠道。【原文：U.S. banks and financial institutions on Monday pushed back against President Donald ‌Trump's proposed cap on credit card interest rates, citing new data that showed it would result in millions of American households and small businesses losing access to credit.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定奥斯特德公司可继续推进罗德岛海上风电项目
item.description: 一名联邦法官周一裁定，允许丹麦海上风电开发商奥斯特德公司重启其即将完工的"革命风电"项目。该项目与另外四个项目上月被美国总统特朗普政府叫停。【原文：A federal judge on Monday cleared Danish offshore wind developer Orsted to resume work on its nearly finished Revolution Wind project, which U.S. President Donald Trump's administration halted along with four other projects last month.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会修订威瑞森手机解锁规则，此前该服务存在重大欺诈问题
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会修订了一项长期存在的规定，该规定要求威瑞森通信公司在手机激活后60天内解除锁定。威瑞森表示，由于欺诈行为，该规定每年给这家电信公司造成数亿美元损失。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission revised a long-standing rule that required Verizon Communications to unlock its mobile phones 60 days after activation, which it said is costing the telecommunications company hundreds of millions of dollars annually due to fraud.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻报道，花旗集团计划裁减约1000个岗位。
item.description: 据彭博社周一报道，知情人士透露，花旗集团本周将裁减约1000个岗位。【原文：Citigroup is set to cut about 1,000 jobs this week Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国超市阿尔迪今年将在美国开设180家门店
item.description: 德国折扣零售商阿尔迪周一宣布，今年将在美国31个州开设超过180家门店，随着越来越注重成本的美国消费者选择在其超市购物。【原文：German discount retailer Aldi on Monday said it would open more than 180 stores across 31 U.S. states this year, as more cost-conscious Americans shop at its supermarkets.】

item.title: 据消息人士称，伊朗民众正利用马斯克的星链服务规避互联网封锁
item.description: 尽管伊朗全国通信中断，仍有部分伊朗人继续使用埃隆·马斯克的星链卫星互联网服务。据该国三名知情人士透露，这再次印证了星链在应对地缘政治热点地区互联网封锁中的作用。【原文：Some Iranians are still using Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite internet service despite a nationwide communications blackout, three people inside the country said, the latest example of Starlink being used to counter internet shutdowns in geopolitical flashpoints.】

item.title: 德国财政部长克林格贝尔表示，华盛顿会议讨论了稀土价格下限问题
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯·克林贝尔表示，周一在华盛顿举行的发达经济体财长会议讨论了设定价格下限的可能性，以及建立战略性稀土供应保障伙伴关系的问题，并指出许多议题仍悬而未决。【原文：Finance ‌ministers from a group of advanced economies meeting in Washington on Monday discussed a possible price floor as well as partnerships to secure strategic rare-earth supplies, Germany's Lars Klingbeil said, adding that many issues remained open.】

item.title: 空客就发动机供应问题对普惠公司采取行动
item.description: 空客周一对普惠公司喷气发动机的供应表示担忧，称尚未就"可预见的未来"所需的供应量与这家美国制造商达成协议。【原文：Airbus raised concerns over the availability of jet engines from Pratt & Whitney on Monday, saying it had yet to reach agreement with the U.S. manufacturer over the volume of supplies that it needs "for the foreseeable future".】

item.title: Meta将启动"Meta Compute"计划，打造兆瓦级计算能力
item.description: Meta首席执行官马克·扎克伯格周一表示，Meta将成立Meta Compute公司，在本十年内构建数十吉瓦的计算基础设施，未来还将再增加数百吉瓦。【原文：Meta will establish Meta Compute to construct tens of gigawatts of computing infrastructure this decade and hundreds of gigawatts more in the future, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国参议院共和党人担忧对鲍威尔的调查及其对美联储的影响
item.description: 美国参议院共和党人周一对特朗普政府威胁起诉美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔表示担忧。两名议员扬言将通过阻挠特朗普总统提名央行官员进行报复，另有第三名议员呼吁迅速终止联邦调查。【原文：U.S. Senate Republicans expressed concern on Monday about the Trump administration's threat to indict Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, as two lawmakers threatened to ​retaliate by blocking President Donald Trump's central bank nominees and a third called for the federal ‌probe to end quickly.】

item.title: 星展银行建议投资者对冲美元风险，并考虑低成本的亚洲货币。
item.description: 星展集团行政总裁陈素珊周一建议持有大量美元头寸的投资者考虑对冲操作，称亚洲货币融资成本较低，且区域汇率似乎被低估。【原文：DBS Group Chief Executive Tan Su Shan on Monday advised investors with heavy U.S. dollar exposure to consider hedging, saying funding costs in Asian currencies are low and regional exchange rates look undervalued.】

item.title: Capital One银行4.25亿美元存款人和解协议获初步批准，此前曾遭驳回
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂蒂亚·詹姆斯表示，联邦法官于周一初步批准了Capital One银行与储户达成的修订版4.25亿美元集体诉讼和解协议。此前两个月，该法官曾否决了该银行与储户达成的早期和解协议。这些储户声称自己被欺骗，未能获得高利率。【原文：A federal judge granted ​preliminary approval on ‌Monday to Capital One's revised $425 million class action settlement with depositors ‌who said they were cheated ​out of high interest rates, two ‍months after rejecting an earlier accord, New York Attorney ⁠General Letitia James ‍said.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官指出美国有150万复合GLP-1药物使用者
item.description: 诺和诺德首席执行官迈克·杜斯特达尔周一表示，美国可能有高达150万患者正在使用畅销GLP-1药物的复合版本，这凸显了更便宜的未经批准替代品如何占据了肥胖治疗需求的重要份额。【原文：Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar said on Monday as many as 1.5 million patients in the U.S. may be using compounded versions of blockbuster GLP-1 drugs, underscoring how cheaper, unapproved alternatives have captured a significant share of demand for obesity treatments.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》报道：美台即将达成贸易协议，将降低关税并推动台积电扩建设施
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周一报道，特朗普政府即将与台湾达成贸易协议，将关税税率降至15%，并要求台湾积体电路制造公司承诺在亚利桑那州再建至少五家工厂。该报道援引了三位知情人士的消息。【原文：The Trump administration is nearing a trade deal with Taiwan to reduce its tariff rate to 15% and commit Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation to building at least five more facilities in Arizona, the New York Times reported on Monday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利反垄断机构将亚马逊创纪录罚款削减至8.782亿美元
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构周一宣布，将对美国电商巨头亚马逊开出的创纪录罚单金额从最初的11.28亿欧元下调至7.524亿欧元（约合8.782亿美元）。【原文：Italy's antitrust authority said on Monday it had reduced a record fine imposed on U.S e-commerce giant Amazon to 752.4 million euros ($878.20 million) from an original amount of 1.128 billion euros.】

item.title: 2025年空客客机交付量增长4%
item.description: 欧洲航空航天集团空客周一表示，去年其飞机交付量增长4%，达到793架，尽管近期遭遇工业生产障碍，但仍有望保持全球最大飞机制造商的地位。【原文：Airbus deliveries rose 4% last year to reach 793 aircraft, putting it on course to remain the world's largest planemaker despite recent industrial snags, the European aerospace group said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称，已婚活动人士准备在BlackLine发起代理权争夺战
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，激进投资者Engaged Capital正计划发起代理权争夺战，旨在软件制造商BlackLine董事会中增补四名外部董事。该机构认为董事会亟需注入新血液以推进战略选择，包括可能的出售事宜。【原文：Activist investor Engaged Capital is planning to run a proxy fight to install four outside directors at software maker BlackLine , arguing new blood is needed in the boardroom to pursue strategic options, including a possible sale, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 共和党籍美国参议员支持阻止特朗普提名美联储官员，此前鲍威尔面临被起诉威胁
item.description: 美国参议员丽莎·穆尔科斯基周一表态支持同党同僚汤姆·蒂利斯阻止特朗普提名美联储官员的计划。此前司法部周末威胁要起诉美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔。【原文：U.S. Senator Lisa Murkowski on Monday threw her support behind fellow Republican ​Thom Tillis' plan to block President Donald Trump's ‌Fed nominees after the Justice Department over the weekend threatened to indict Fed chairman Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌达成Gemini协议，为升级版Siri铺路，Alphabet取得重大胜利
item.description: 苹果公司将通过一项多年期协议，在今年晚些时候推出的全新Siri中采用谷歌的Gemini模型。此举深化了这两家科技巨头在人工智能时代的联盟，并巩固了Alphabet在与OpenAI竞争中的地位。【原文：Apple will use Google's Gemini models for its revamped Siri coming later this year under a multi-year deal that deepens the tech giants' alliance in the artificial intelligence era and bolsters Alphabet's position in the race against OpenAI.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称必和必拓将静观力拓与嘉能可谈判，暂无竞购计划
item.description: 知情人士透露，必和必拓将静观力拓收购嘉能可的谈判进展——该交易将缔造全球最大的矿业公司——目前暂无计划对这家瑞士企业发起收购要约。【原文：BHP is set to wait out Rio Tinto's talks to take over Glencore , a deal that would create the world's largest mining company, and is not currently planning a bid for the Swiss firm, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 过去三任美联储主席谴责特朗普对鲍威尔发动的"史无前例"的攻击
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会过去三任主席周一与其他前联邦政府经济政策领导人联名谴责特朗普政府对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的刑事调查，称此举类似于那些"制度薄弱"的新兴市场国家中常见的干预央行独立性的行为。【原文：The past three heads of the U.S. Federal Reserve on Monday joined with other former ​federal government economic policy leaders in condemning ‌the Trump administration's criminal probe of Fed Chair Jerome Powell, likening it to the interference with central bank independence more often seen in emerging market countries ‌with "weak institutions."】

item.title: Meta将意大利排除在WhatsApp聊天机器人禁令之外
item.description: 据路透社获得的一份通知显示，在意大利反垄断机构下令后，Meta Platforms将豁免该国于其对WhatsApp上竞争对手AI聊天机器人的禁令。【原文：Meta Platforms will exclude Italy from its ban on rival AI chatbots on WhatsApp following an order from the country's antitrust authority, according to a notice sent to AI providers and developers seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司Alphabet市值突破4万亿美元，人工智能战略调整提振市场信心
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet周一市值突破4万亿美元，其对人工智能的战略聚焦消除了外界对其战略的疑虑，使其在高风险竞争中重回领先地位。【原文：Alphabet hit a $4 trillion market valuation on Monday, as the Google parent's sharpened artificial intelligence focus allayed doubts about its strategy and thrust it back ​to the forefront of the high-stakes race.】

item.title: 摩洛哥计划到2030年实现人工智能对国内生产总值贡献达100亿美元
item.description: 摩洛哥数字转型部长周一表示，该国计划到2030年通过人工智能推动国内生产总值增长1000亿迪拉姆（约合100亿美元）。为此，摩洛哥正加大对培训项目、主权数据中心及云服务的投资力度。【原文：Morocco is targeting a 100 billion dirhams ($10 billion) boost to its gross domestic product from artificial intelligence by 2030, the minister in charge of digital transition said on Monday, as the country steps up its investment in training programmes, sovereign data centres and cloud services.】

item.title: PG&E就2017年及2018年加州野火事件达成1亿美元股东和解协议
item.description: 太平洋天然气电力公司的母公司与股东达成1亿美元和解协议。这些股东指控该公用事业运营商在2017年和2018年北加州野火发生前，对其野火预防和安全规程存在误导行为。【原文：The parent of Pacific Gas and Electric reached a $100 million settlement with shareholders who accused the utility operator of misleading them about its wildfire prevention and safety protocols before wildfires in northern California in 2017 and 2018.】

item.title: 英伟达与礼来公司将在五年内投入10亿美元建立联合研究实验室
item.description: 英伟达与美国制药巨头礼来公司周一宣布，双方将在未来五年内斥资10亿美元，于旧金山湾区建立新的联合研究实验室。该实验室将采用英伟达最新一代Vera Rubin人工智能芯片。【原文：Nvidia and U.S. pharma giant Eli Lilly will spend $1 billion building a new joint research lab in the San Francisco Bay area over five years which will use Nvidia's newest generation Vera Rubin AI chips, the firms said on Monday.】
